name: Ancient Silver Dragon
description: The Ancient Silver Dragon has gleaming silver scales, appearing often as a statue or icy outcropping when at rest. It has an elegant and majestic presence, embodying both strength and resilience.
memorable: Its ability to take human form and interact with mortals, along with its potent breath weapons that can inflict massive cold damage and paralyze foes, make it a unique and adaptable creature.
goals: The dragon aims to protect the innocent and uphold a deep sense of honor, often seeking peaceful resolutions to conflicts.
relations: Ancient Silver Dragons often ally with other good-aligned creatures and can be found serving as protectors or mentors to adventurers.
environment: Typically resides in high mountain ranges or arctic regions where it can blend in with its icy surroundings.
strengths: Immunity to cold damage, high resistance to magical effects, advanced spellcasting abilities, and powerful breath attacks.
weaknesses: May be vulnerable to potent magical effects if it exhausts its legendary resistances.
attacks: Can perform a Multiattack with its bite, claws, and tail, including powerful breath weapons that deal massive cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Frost Breath attack can deal significant cold damage across a wide area and can slow the targets.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet and a passive perception score of 26, showcasing its keen awareness of the surroundings.
skills: Excels in Arcana, History, Perception, and Stealth, indicating its well-rounded intelligence, knowledge, and ability to evade detection.
additional_information: Can use Cloud Strider to avoid harmful effects at high altitudes and become ephemeral clouds.
Has legendary actions for enhanced tactical versatility, including options to frighten enemies and reposition.
Can use Change Shape to transform into a humanoid or beast, retaining many of its abilities.
Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on saving throws it would otherwise fail.
Its potent Frightful Presence can instill fear in nearby creatures, adding a psychological tactic to its combat style.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting allows it to cast spells like Charm Person and Faerie Fire without material components.
